catalog_info.title: The Law, Economics, and Organizations Workshop
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Law School as 96250-11 and with the Business School as 4670.
catalog_info.description: The presentation of work in progress in the field of law, economics, and organizations. Presentations by members of the various Harvard faculties, outside speakers, and graduate students. Students must complete both parts of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
